qas.question: To whom did Barcelona appeal to lift the transfer bad?
During what year was Barcelona not allowed to use  their transfer windows?
When was Zubizareta fired by the board?
After firing the director, what did Barcelona form?

context: In late December, Barcelona's appeal to the <a0_0>Court of Arbitration for Sport<a0_0/> was unsuccessful and the original transfer ban was reinstated, leaving the club unable to utilise the <a1_0>2015<a1_0/> winter and summer transfer windows. On <a2_0>5 January 2015<a2_0/>, Zubizareta was sacked by the board after 4 years as <a3_0>director of football<a3_0/>. The next month, Barcelona announced the formation of a new <a4_0>Football Area Technical Commission<a4_0/>, made up of vice-president Jordi Mestre, board member Javier Bordas, Carles Rexach and Ariedo Braida.
